core

Class TilePositionContenderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.TilePositionFactory
      • core.TilePositionContenderFactory

  • public class TilePositionContenderFactory
extends TilePositionFactory
    TilePositionContenderGenerator.java --- Class for generating the default contended construction spots on the map, on which no worker can construct a building.
    Author:
    P H - 21.04.2017

    • Method Detail

      • generateDefaultContendedTilePositions

        public java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> generateDefaultContendedTilePositions()
        Function for generating the Default contended TilePositions in the beginning of the game. These include a x wide path at the map border, y tiles around all mineral spots and a z wide ring around all gas geysers.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all default contended TilePositions.

      • contendTilePositionsAroundMinerals

        private void contendTilePositionsAroundMinerals(java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> designatedHashSet,
                                                java.util.List<bwapi.Unit> excludedUnits)
        Function for contending all TilePositions in a specific area around each mineral spot on the map.
        Parameters:
        designatedHashSet - the HashSet in which the TilePositions are going to be stored.
        excludedUnits - the Units that are not going to be looked at during the iterations.
